brainly_data.question: A physics student takes her pulse and determines that her heart beats periodically 60 times in 60 seconds. the period of her heartbeat is
brainly_data.subject: Biology

all_answers.question: A physics student takes her pulse and determines that her heart beats periodically 60 times in 60 seconds. the period of her heartbeat is
all_answers.subject: Biology
all_answers.text:
The correct answer is 1 second.
A period is a physical term which describes the time needed for one cycle of vibration to complete and reach a certain point. In this example, the term period refers to the time needed for one complete heartbeat to occur. Since 60 heartbeats occur in 60 seconds, then one heartbeat needs 1 second to complete.
